title: Typographic blogs similar to bibliodyssey.com
content:
Hi guys,

Does anybody know of typographic blogs similar to bibliodyssey.com, lots of imagery from old books and ephemera?

Thanks very much  
Diogo
author: dsoares1

comments.content:
Diogo,

The link is wrong. You mean [this one?](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014133141/http:/bibliodyssey.blogspot.com/).

É sempre bom ver "tugas" por estes lados...:)

António

Olá António, thanks for that!

Here goes the right link:

[http://bibliodyssey.blogspot.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014133141/http:/bibliodyssey.blogspot.com/ "http://bibliodyssey.blogspot.com/")

Cheers  
Diogo
